identity.name: ContentFlow
principles: Content First: UI recedes, content pops.
Density with Breath: High information density (for pros) but with generous padding.
Soft Utility: Functional but not sterile. Rounded corners, soft borders, no harsh lines.
No Clutter: If it doesn't help the user find or create, hide it.

general: Remove all 'studio-card', 'glass-card', and 'animate-float' classes. Replace with standard Tailwind classes defined in 'components.cards'.
Switch font stack to Manrope (headings) and Inter (body). Update index.css imports.
Simplify the Sidebar: Use a flat white background with a right border. No floating or glass effects.
Dashboard: Implement the 'Bento Grid' layout. Use 'col-span' classes to create an interesting but organized layout.
Discover/Images: Use a clean masonry or grid layout. Remove colorful badges unless they indicate status (e.g., 'Live', 'Processing').
Content Library: Use a clean tabbed interface. Avoid 'boxed' tabs; use 'underline' or 'pill' styles.
Settings: Use a single-column layout with clear section dividers.

specific_files.index.css: Replace the entire 'creative studio' section with the new 'Soft Utility' variables and utility classes.
specific_files.tailwind.config.js: Ensure colors extend the new palette (neutral-50 to neutral-950, primary indigo).
specific_files.App.js: Ensure the main layout wrapper uses 'bg-neutral-50/50' and 'text-neutral-900'.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) ONLY for overlays/modals, not main cards.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add `.App { text-align: center; }` in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
